elements.name: question5
elements.title: How many times have you (the program) underlined the words "data"? How do you find out without counting?
elements.correctAnswer: Use "Find and replace" to search for "Data with formatting underline" and replace with "Data with formatting underline".

elements.name: question3
elements.title: How did you solve the problem with the English words? To what extent was Word a help, no help, why?
elements.correctAnswer: Word cannot think, so this task is too demanding. So you had to decide for yourself whether a word comes from English or not.
